info.name: Semi-updated - New UI Anilist 2020 (DARK)
info.description:
SOMETHINGS ARE STILL BROKEN !

This is a Edited version of : https://github.com/Z3ROGRAV1TYx/Anilist-Dark-Theme (open for more detailed and accurate information )

This is a theme created for Anilist to enhance the user's viewing experience.

By LeoSan
info.additionalInfo:
How To Install:
Install Stylus (or a similar extension):

(It is not reccomended to use Stylish, due to it not being open source, and many past issues regarding analytics, telemetry, data-collection and more.)

Go to anilist.co and ensure that the theme is enabled in Stylus (or addon of choice).
Go to anilist.co/settings and ensure that the "Site Theme" is set to 'Dark', otherwise the userstyle may not work properly!
